quiz.question: unstinting _______
quiz.explanation: 慷慨的, 慷慨的支持. The charity received unstinting support from donors. 慈善机构得到了捐赠者慷慨的支持。

quiz.question: vaunting ________
quiz.explanation: 自负的, 自负的野心. His vaunting ambition led him to take excessive risks. 他自负的野心导致他承担过度的风险。

quiz.question: doting ______
quiz.explanation: 溺爱的, 溺爱的父亲. The doting father spoiled his only daughter. 溺爱的父亲宠坏了他唯一的女儿。

quiz.question: ___ sting
quiz.explanation: 刺, 蜜蜂刺. The bee sting caused painful swelling. 蜜蜂刺引起了疼痛的肿胀。

quiz.question: everlasting _____
quiz.explanation: 永恒的, 永恒的和平. The treaty promised everlasting peace between nations. 该条约承诺国家间的永恒和平。

quiz.question: jesting ____
quiz.explanation: 开玩笑的, 开玩笑的语气. He spoke in a jesting tone that made everyone laugh. 他用开玩笑的语气说话,逗得每个人都笑了。

quiz.question: arresting ______
quiz.explanation: 引人注目的, 引人注目的美丽. The model possessed arresting beauty that captivated photographers. 这位模特拥有吸引摄影师的引人注目的美丽。

quiz.question: sidesplitting ______
quiz.explanation: 令人捧腹的, 令人捧腹的喜剧. The sidesplitting comedy had audiences roaring with laughter. 令人捧腹的喜剧让观众哄堂大笑。

quiz.question: earsplitting _____
quiz.explanation: 震耳欲聋的, 震耳欲聋的噪音. The earsplitting noise from construction woke the neighborhood. 建筑工地震耳欲聋的噪音吵醒了整个社区。

quiz.question: unremitting ______
quiz.explanation: 不懈的, 不懈的努力. Success came through unremitting effort over many years. 成功来自多年不懈的努力。

quiz.question: unwitting __________
quiz.explanation: 不知情的, 不知情的同谋. He became an unwitting accomplice to the fraud scheme. 他成了欺诈计划的不知情同谋。

quiz.question: craving ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 渴望, 对糖的渴望. Pregnant women often experience craving for sugar. 孕妇经常会有对糖的渴望。

quiz.question: gnawing ______
quiz.explanation: 啃噬般的, 啃噬般的饥饿. The gnawing hunger distracted him from his work. 啃噬般的饥饿使他无法专心工作。

quiz.question: glowing ______
quiz.explanation: 热情洋溢的, 热情洋溢的评论. The restaurant received a glowing review from critics. 这家餐厅得到了评论家热情洋溢的评论。

quiz.question: harrowing ____
quiz.explanation: 悲惨的, 悲惨的故事. The survivor told a harrowing tale of escape. 幸存者讲述了一个悲惨的逃亡故事。

quiz.question: ________ upswing
quiz.explanation: 上升, 经济上升. The country experienced an economic upswing after reforms. 该国在改革后经历了经济上升。

quiz.question: taxing ____
quiz.explanation: 费力的, 费力的任务. Writing the dissertation proved to be a taxing task. 写论文被证明是一项费力的任务。

quiz.question: underlying _____
quiz.explanation: 根本的, 根本原因. Doctors sought to identify the underlying cause of illness. 医生试图找出疾病的根本原因。

quiz.question: cloying _________
quiz.explanation: 过分甜腻的, 过分甜腻. The dessert had a cloying sweetness that was overwhelming. 这道甜点有一种过分甜腻让人无法忍受。

quiz.question: vying ___ _________
quiz.explanation: 竞争, 竞争注意力. Several candidates are vying for attention in the primary. 几位候选人在初选中竞争注意力。

quiz.question: appetizing _____
quiz.explanation: 开胃的, 开胃的香味. An appetizing aroma wafted from the kitchen. 一股开胃的香味从厨房飘来。

quiz.question: ______ _ gong
quiz.explanation: 锣, 敲锣. The ceremony began when they strike a gong. 当他们敲锣时仪式开始了。

quiz.question: prolong ____
quiz.explanation: 延长, 延长生命. Medical advances can prolong life but not guarantee quality. 医学进步可以延长生命但不能保证质量。

quiz.question: headstrong _____
quiz.explanation: 任性的, 任性的孩子. The headstrong child refused to follow instructions. 任性的孩子拒绝听从指示。

quiz.question: bog ____
quiz.explanation: 陷入, 陷入困境. The project began to bog down in bureaucratic delays. 该项目开始陷入官僚拖延的困境。

quiz.question: hangdog ____
quiz.explanation: 沮丧的, 沮丧的表情. He wore a hangdog look after the scolding. 被训斥后他露出沮丧的表情。

quiz.question: _____ ___ underdog
quiz.explanation: 弱者, 为弱者欢呼. Fans love to cheer the underdog in competitions. 粉丝喜欢在比赛中为弱者欢呼。

quiz.question: agog ____ _________
quiz.explanation: 急切的, 充满好奇心. The children were agog with curiosity about the surprise. 孩子们对惊喜充满好奇心。

quiz.question: ____ _ log
quiz.explanation: 日志, 记录日志. The captain must keep a log of all ship activities. 船长必须记录所有船只活动的日志。

quiz.question: _______ catalog
quiz.explanation: 目录, 产品目录. The company published a new product catalog. 公司出版了新的产品目录。

quiz.question: lug _ ________
quiz.explanation: 拖拉, 拖拉手提箱. He had to lug a suitcase up five flights of stairs. 他不得不把手提箱拖上五层楼梯。

quiz.question: ______ pariah
quiz.explanation: 贱民, 社会贱民. After the scandal, he became a social pariah. 丑闻之后,他成了社会贱民。

quiz.question: cheetah ______
quiz.explanation: 猎豹, 猎豹冲刺. The cheetah sprint reached speeds of 70 mph. 猎豹冲刺达到每小时70英里的速度。

quiz.question: bleach ______
quiz.explanation: 漂白, 漂白污渍. Use chlorine bleach to bleach stains from white fabrics. 使用氯漂白剂漂白白色织物上的污渍。

quiz.question: ________ breach
quiz.explanation: 违反, 安全违反. The company suffered a major security breach. 公司遭受了重大安全违反。

quiz.question: preach _ ______
quiz.explanation: 布道, 布道. The minister will preach a sermon on forgiveness. 牧师将布道关于宽恕的道。

quiz.question: overreach _________
quiz.explanation: 越权, 越权. The official was accused of trying to overreach authority. 该官员被指控试图越权。

quiz.question: poach ____
quiz.explanation: 水煮, 水煮鸡蛋. She learned how to poach eggs perfectly. 她学会了如何完美地水煮鸡蛋。

quiz.question: encroach __ ______
quiz.explanation: 侵犯, 侵犯权利. The new law threatens to encroach on rights of citizens. 新法律威胁要侵犯公民的权利。

quiz.question: approach _ _______
quiz.explanation: 处理, 处理问题. Different people approach a problem in different ways. 不同的人以不同的方式处理问题。

quiz.question: detach ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 分离, 分离面板. You need to detach the panel to access the wiring. 你需要分离面板来接触电线。

quiz.question: attach _ ____
quiz.explanation: 附加, 附加文件. Please attach a file with your application. 请在申请中附加文件。

quiz.question: beseech ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 恳求, 恳求法庭. The lawyer will beseech the court for leniency. 律师将恳求法庭宽大处理。

quiz.question: ostrich ______
quiz.explanation: 鸵鸟, 鸵鸟政策. The government adopted an ostrich policy toward the crisis. 政府对危机采取了鸵鸟政策。

quiz.question: filch _____
quiz.explanation: 偷窃, 偷窃钱财. The employee was caught trying to filch money from the till. 员工被抓到试图从收银机偷窃钱财。

quiz.question: ________ gulch
quiz.explanation: 峡谷, 山间峡谷. The trail descended into a narrow mountain gulch. 小径下降到一个狭窄的山间峡谷。

quiz.question: stanch ___ ________
quiz.explanation: 止住, 止住流血. Medics worked to stanch the bleeding from the wound. 医护人员努力止住伤口的流血。

quiz.question: ___ __ ___ bench
quiz.explanation: 长凳, 坐在长凳上. The elderly couple would sit on the bench in the park. 老年夫妇会坐在公园的长凳上。

quiz.question: trench _______
quiz.explanation: 战壕, 战壕战. World War I was characterized by brutal trench warfare. 第一次世界大战的特点是残酷的战壕战。

quiz.question: retrench ________
quiz.explanation: 削减, 削减开支. The company was forced to retrench spending during recession. 公司在衰退期间被迫削减开支。

quiz.question: entrench _____
quiz.explanation: 巩固, 巩固权力. The leader sought to entrench power through new laws. 领导人试图通过新法律巩固权力。

quiz.question: wrench ____
quiz.explanation: 猛拧, 猛拧挣脱. He managed to wrench free from his captor's grip. 他设法从绑架者的控制中猛拧挣脱。

quiz.question: quench ______
quiz.explanation: 解渴, 解渴. Cold water helped quench thirst after the long run. 长跑后冷水帮助解渴。

quiz.question: pinch __ ____
quiz.explanation: 一撮, 一撮盐. The recipe calls for just a pinch of salt. 食谱只需要一撮盐。

quiz.question: _____ _ punch
quiz.explanation: 出拳, 出拳. The boxer was ready to throw a punch. 拳击手准备出拳。

quiz.question: lynch ___
quiz.explanation: 私刑, 私刑暴民. The angry lynch mob threatened violence. 愤怒的私刑暴民威胁使用暴力。

quiz.question: _______ brooch
quiz.explanation: 胸针, 钻石胸针. She wore an elegant diamond brooch on her lapel. 她在翻领上戴着优雅的钻石胸针。

quiz.question: _________ epoch
quiz.explanation: 时代, 维多利亚时代. The Victorian epoch was marked by industrial progress. 维多利亚时代以工业进步为标志。

quiz.question: arch _____
quiz.explanation: 主要的, 主要对手. The two companies have been arch rival for decades. 这两家公司几十年来一直是主要对手。

quiz.question: oligarch ____
quiz.explanation: 寡头, 寡头统治. The country suffered under corrupt oligarch rule. 该国在腐败的寡头统治下受苦。

quiz.question: ________ monarch
quiz.explanation: 君主, 绝对君主. An absolute monarch held unchecked power over the realm. 绝对君主对王国拥有不受约束的权力。

quiz.question: _ batch __ ______
quiz.explanation: 一批, 一批订单. The factory processed a batch of orders overnight. 工厂连夜处理了一批订单。

quiz.question: hatch _ ____
quiz.explanation: 策划, 策划阴谋. The conspirators met secretly to hatch a plot. 阴谋者秘密会面策划阴谋。

quiz.question: ____ latch
quiz.explanation: 门闩, 门闩. The door latch needs to be repaired. 门闩需要修理。

quiz.question: snatch _____
quiz.explanation: 抢夺, 抢夺钱包. A thief tried to snatch purse from the woman. 小偷试图从女人那里抢夺钱包。

quiz.question: dispatch _____
quiz.explanation: 派送, 派送货物. The warehouse will dispatch goods tomorrow morning. 仓库明天早上将派送货物。

quiz.question: ___ _ ditch
quiz.explanation: 沟渠, 挖沟渠. Workers began to dig a ditch for the pipeline. 工人开始为管道挖沟渠。

quiz.question: ______ snitch
quiz.explanation: 告密者, 警方告密者. The criminal was caught by information from a police snitch. 罪犯因警方告密者的信息而被捕。

quiz.question: _____ pitch
quiz.explanation: 推销, 推销宣传. The salesman delivered his sales pitch enthusiastically. 推销员热情地发表了他的推销宣传。

quiz.question: scotch _____
quiz.explanation: 制止, 制止谣言. Officials moved quickly to scotch rumor about the scandal. 官员们迅速采取行动制止关于丑闻的谣言。

quiz.question: ___ _ notch
quiz.explanation: 刻痕, 刻一个痕. The woodsman would cut a notch to mark his trail. 樵夫会刻一个痕来标记他的路线。

quiz.question: ____ ____ crutch
quiz.explanation: 拐杖, 用拐杖走路. After the injury, he had to walk with crutch. 受伤后,他不得不用拐杖走路。

quiz.question: debouch ____ ___ _____
quiz.explanation: 流出, 流入平原. The river will debouch into the plain after the mountains. 河流在山区之后将流入平原。

quiz.question: ________ grouch
quiz.explanation: 爱发牢骚的人, 习惯性爱发牢骚的人. The habitual grouch complained about everything. 习惯性爱发牢骚的人抱怨一切。

quiz.question: retouch _ _____
quiz.explanation: 修饰, 修饰照片. The photographer will retouch a photo to remove blemishes. 摄影师将修饰照片以去除瑕疵。

quiz.question: ____ nonesuch
quiz.explanation: 无与伦比的, 稀有的无与伦比之物. The painting is a rare nonesuch in the collection. 这幅画是藏品中稀有的无与伦比之物。

quiz.question: ____ sleigh
quiz.explanation: 雪橇, 乘雪橇. Children love to ride sleigh during winter holidays. 孩子们喜欢在冬季假期乘雪橇。

quiz.question: inveigh _______
quiz.explanation: 猛烈抨击, 猛烈抨击. The politician would inveigh against corruption in government. 这位政客会猛烈抨击政府的腐败。

quiz.question: slough ___
quiz.explanation: 蜕皮, 蜕去. Snakes regularly slough off their old skin. 蛇定期蜕去旧皮。

quiz.question: holograph ____
quiz.explanation: 亲笔文件, 亲笔遗嘱. The lawyer verified the holograph will was authentic. 律师核实了亲笔遗嘱是真实的。

quiz.question: homograph ____
quiz.explanation: 同形异义词, 同形异义词对. The words lead and lead form a homograph pair. 单词lead和lead构成同形异义词对。

quiz.question: _________ monograph
quiz.explanation: 专题论文, 技术专题论文. The professor published a technical monograph on the subject. 教授出版了一篇关于该主题的技术专题论文。

quiz.question: _____ epitaph
quiz.explanation: 墓志铭, 墓碑墓志铭. The grave epitaph commemorated his life achievements. 墓碑墓志铭纪念了他一生的成就。

quiz.question: ________ hieroglyph
quiz.explanation: 象形文字, 埃及象形文字. Scholars study ancient Egyptian hieroglyph on temple walls. 学者研究庙宇墙壁上的古埃及象形文字。

quiz.question: _______ petroglyph
quiz.explanation: 岩画, 古代岩画. Archaeologists discovered ancient petroglyph in the canyon. 考古学家在峡谷中发现了古代岩画。

quiz.question: slapdash ____
quiz.explanation: 草率的, 草率的工作. The contractor was criticized for slapdash work. 承包商因草率的工作而受到批评。

quiz.question: brash ________
quiz.explanation: 鲁莽的, 鲁莽的行为. His brash behavior offended many colleagues. 他鲁莽的行为冒犯了许多同事。

quiz.question: ____ sash
quiz.explanation: 腰带, 丝绸腰带. She tied a decorative silk sash around her waist. 她在腰上系了一条装饰性的丝绸腰带。

quiz.question: stash ____ ____
quiz.explanation: 藏匿, 藏匿现金. He tried to stash away cash in offshore accounts. 他试图在离岸账户中藏匿现金。

quiz.question: mesh _______
quiz.explanation: 网状物, 网状网络. The system uses a mesh network for connectivity. 该系统使用网状网络进行连接。

quiz.question: enmesh __ _______
quiz.explanation: 使卷入, 使卷入丑闻. The politician became enmesh in scandal. 这位政客卷入了丑闻。

quiz.question: thresh _____
quiz.explanation: 打谷, 打小麦. Farmers would thresh wheat to separate grain from chaff. 农民会打小麦以将谷物与谷壳分离。

quiz.question: furbish _______
quiz.explanation: 擦亮, 擦亮武器. Knights would furbish weapons before battle. 骑士会在战斗前擦亮武器。

quiz.question: refurbish _ ____
quiz.explanation: 翻新, 翻新房间. The hotel plans to refurbish a room on every floor. 酒店计划翻新每层楼的一个房间。

quiz.question: faddish _____
quiz.explanation: 时尚的, 时尚的潮流. The faddish trend quickly faded from popularity. 时尚的潮流很快就不再流行了。

quiz.question: outlandish ______
quiz.explanation: 古怪的, 古怪的服装. She appeared at the party in an outlandish outfit. 她穿着古怪的服装出现在派对上。

quiz.question: modish ______
quiz.explanation: 时髦的, 时髦的设计. The boutique featured modish design from Paris. 这家精品店展示了来自巴黎的时髦设计。

quiz.question: prudish ________
quiz.explanation: 过分拘谨的, 过分拘谨的态度. Her prudish attitude made others uncomfortable. 她过分拘谨的态度让其他人感到不舒服。

quiz.question: raffish _____
quiz.explanation: 放荡不羁的, 放荡不羁的魅力. The actor possessed a certain raffish charm. 这位演员拥有某种放荡不羁的魅力。

quiz.question: offish ________
quiz.explanation: 冷淡的, 冷淡的态度. His offish attitude discouraged friendly conversation. 他冷淡的态度阻碍了友好的交谈。
